Name: SEARCH ALL - FRUITS
About the game: SEARCH ALL - FRUITS is a Hidden Object game where you have to find all the fruits in a large area. Fruits will be located in a variety of places, from the most visible to the barely noticeable places. The entire game location looks animated due to the animation elements. Find all fruits! Don't let them go unnoticed :) Key features: - Animation elements on the location; - 100 fruits to find; - Nice soundtrack; - The gameplay can be interrupted at any time, and the game will automatically save the result; - Implemented hints! If you find it difficult to find an item, use the hint!
